All you have to do is to Login into your Microsoft Endpoint Manager , Click on DEVICES , and you can see all devices managed by your Endpoint Manager

The underlined text in the question states "Mobile Apps blade", which is not correct for the scenario where you need to determine how many devices run each operating system. The Mobile Apps blade is used to manage and deploy mobile apps to devices, not to view information about the devices and their operating systems.

Instead, you would need to navigate to the "Devices" blade in Microsoft Intune to view device inventory and details about the operating systems running on those devices. Therefore, the correct answer would be "D. Devices".
